ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( ) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.38"
SHALL conform to Consol Medications Administered Section template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.38)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, SHALL contain at least one [1..*] entry (CONF:8156)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Consol Medication Activity (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.16)
SHALL conform to Consol Medications Administered Section template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.38)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:15383)/@code="29549-3" Medications Administered (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:15384)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, MAY contain zero or more [0..*] entry (CONF:8156)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Medication Activity (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.16)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, SHALL contain at least one [1..*] entry (CONF:8156)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Consol Medication Activity (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.16)
